Returns: True if the dependents should be disabled, otherwise false.
shouldDisableDependents().Description: Checks whether this preference's dependents should currently be disabled.

Returns: True if this Preference is enabled, false otherwise.
isEnabled().Description: Checks whether this Preference should be enabled in the list.

ClassDesc: Used to group @B_android#support#v7#preference#Preference_E@ objects and provide a disabled title above the group.
